<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find a Room Recording by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/room_recordings/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



A detailed summary of a particular Room Recording.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Video_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"ID of room recording to return","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"media_ttl","in":"query","description":"Generated media links will be valid for this many seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes).","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":900}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the Room Recording"},"room_session_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the Room Session the Room Recording was made in."},"status":{"type":"string","example":"completed"},"started_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp of when the Room Recording started."},"finished_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp of when the Room Recording stopped."},"duration":{"type":"integer","example":120,"description":"The length of the Room Recording in seconds."},"size_in_bytes":{"type":"integer","example":20971520,"description":"The number of bytes of the Room Recording file."},"format":{"type":"string","example":"video/mp4","description":"The MIME type of the Room Recording file."},"uri":{"type":"string","description":"A temporary URL for accessing your recording file. This URL, by default, is only valid for 15 minutes.","example":"https://files.signalwire.com/temporary/link/to/the/recording/file"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
